TFileInfo Struct Reference
[File related functions]

File information for an image. More...

#include <kernel_io.h>


Data Fields

char * FileName
char * PathName
char * PathAndFileName

Detailed Description

File information for an image.

The file/path names are set by k_Load() and k_Save(). The members in the struct can be seen under "parameters".

See also:
k_Load , k_Save

Definition at line 46 of file kernel_io.h.

Field Documentation

char* TFileInfo::FileName
 

Parameters:
FileName  file name with extension, NULL if no file loaded.
